text: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

text: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack of will.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Self-discipline is the magic power that makes you virtually unstoppable.
author: Dan Kennedy

text: Discipline is the foundation upon which all success is built.
author: Unknown
